title: N173 Old Judge 1888/1889 checklists for sale
author: autograf

posts.post_title: N173 Old Judge 1888/1889 checklists for sale
posts.post_content:
1888 horizontal checklist.  Far left panel detached as seen but nice condition otherwise.  SOLD

[IMG]http://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-SR3fTx3hhhw/Vdh4eWmCJSI/AAAAAAAAHBI/pdMA1Sc67F0/s2048-no/2015_08_22_09_26_17.jpg[/IMG]

1889 checklist two-sided.  Pretty clean overall.  $275.

[IMG]http://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-YvsoM0WgHWc/Vdh4dKQWNNI/AAAAAAAAHA4/44PhahgoWss/s2048-no/2015_08_22_09_26_11.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-m7RBYC3cSyE/Vdh4dwzYTII/AAAAAAAAHBA/1tW0rb_EQcg/s2048-no/2015_08_22_09_26_14.jpg[/IMG]

PayPal FF or check/money order.
